select j.jobs_id, c.photo, c.comp_name, j.title, j.content, j.career, j.education, j.position, r.skill_name1, r.skill_name2, r.skill_name3, j.address, j.homepage, j.end_date from comp_tb c join jobs_tb j on c.comp_id = j.comp_id join REQUIRED_SKILL_TB r on j.jobs_id = r.jobs_id where j.jobs_id = #{jobsId}
